about_the_game:
Warning
-This game has a lot of minigames, they're all skippable but if minigames don't interest you then you might not enjoy this very much. The concept is that Raven challenges you to these games to see which of you will have to carry out a dare. The minigames are largely timing based
-This game is silly(Raven wears armour to university, a character turns invisible etc)
-There is very little sex in this game, it's mostly light-hearted ENF moments
-The moments in which the characters are fully dressed and just having a conversation are mostly done in a VN style with sprites with everything else being rendered in more detail

Story


Raven is a University student with a superiority complex but her ego takes a hit when you beat her in an exam. Now desperate to prove her superiority over you, she has challenged you to various games to decide which of you will have to complete humiliating dares. You'll also need to deal with a stalker named Willow and help Tenma save her Lab. The story covers one week of your life where you'll have the option to romance either Raven, Willow or Tenma.

Features


- Voice Acting for all characters except male player character and a few very minor characters
- 'Raven's Daring Trivia Night' and 'Alice' included with this game
- Music and sound effects throughout
- Over 1,700 3D Rendered Images/Sprites over the 3 games
- Male protagonist


Raven's Daring Trivia Night

You play as Alice, you've been invited to the Raven's Nest to play Raven's new trivia game against 6 different opponents. You'll need to answer questions and play minigames to unlock dare images and epilogues for each character you challenge.

- Partial Voice Acting(Questions and character intros only)
- Music and sound effects throughout
- 6 stages, each ending in a minigame
- 3 dare images per stage
- Female protogonist

Alice

Alice has been invited to a gathering with the other employees at FunTime Labs but after doing a small favour for Willow, she has been left without any clothes and needs to find some quick to avoid being caught. Luckily, she's had plenty of experience spying on other companies for Ada and she's never been caught, so this should be fine...

- 137 3D Rendered Images
- No voice acting
- Music and sound effects throughout
- Female protagonist


Auris Valara as Raven
Auris Valara as Willow
K98 as Tenma
J96 as Lola
Jess Summers as Herself(Cameo)
Ivettexo as Random Students
J96 as Additional Voices


•••••••••••• Music By •••••••••••••
"In a Pensive Mood''
''Indian Hop"
"With Loved Ones"
"Indie"
"Peace and People"

Jay Man - OurMusicBox

Sound effects obtained from zapsplat

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains nudity throughout. There is one brief sex scene, it's consensual and nothing too explicit(no penetration) is shown.

name: Raven's Daring Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 2GB or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Raven has challenged you to various games to decide which of you will have to complete humiliating dares. A Choose-Your-Own-Adventure ENF-Themed game with over 1,700 3D Images and voice acting. Also includes 'Raven's Daring Trivia Night' and 'Alice'
